HtmlTrees Module¶

class epyk.core.html.HtmlTrees.DropDown(report, data, text, width, height, htmlCode, helper, options, profile)¶
property options¶

Property to set all the possible object for a dropdown

Return type

OptTrees.OptDropDown

property style¶
Return type

GrpClsList.ClassDropDown

to_word(document)¶
Description:

Apply the corresponding function to produce the same result in a word document. This function is very specific and it has to be defined in each class.

Related Pages:

http://python-docx.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

to_xls(workbook, worksheet, cursor)¶

Apply the corresponding function to produce the same result in a word document. This function is very specific and it has to be defined in each class.

Related Pages:

https://xlsxwriter.readthedocs.io/
